name: translucence
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being translucent (= almost transparent, in an attractive way): You need to cook the fish just enough for the flesh to lose its pearly translucence while still being moist. Her skin had the papery-thin translucence of great age. See
translucent
More examplesFewer examples It was made of old paper, thin to the point of translucence.The marble was coveted throughout the ancient world for its fine translucence.the translucence of onions cooked in chicken fat
